name: Push Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart on the ground and your body forming a straight line from head to heels.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.
3. Lower your torso until your chest or breasts almost touch the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body and your forearms parallel to the ground.
4. Push back up to the starting position using your triceps and chest muscles to straighten your arms.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, maintaining control throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Push ups are a classic upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps, requiring minimal equipment.
